tweet.html: RT @FSIatState: Do you love historical research? #FSI’s Office of the Historian is seeking @VSFSatState eInterns to conduct research on U.S. relations with Sub-Saharan Africa. Learn more here: go.usa.gov/xfrHj. @HistoryAtState #ApplyinJuly
